mapper.sql: select pgo.overview_id, pgo.dept_id, pgo.user_id, pgo.project_id, pgo.gather_month, pgo.total_score, pgo.gather_status, pgo.gather_id, pgo.audit_id, pgo.audit_time, pgo.create_by, pgo.create_time, pgo.update_by, pgo.update_time, pgo.remark, vp.post_name post_name, d.dept_name dept_name from perf_gather_overview pgo left join perf_ind_project pip on pgo.project_id = pip.project_id left join sys_dept d on pgo.dept_id = d.dept_id left join vip_post vp on pip.post_id = vp.post_id
